_description: ‘Stimulus Conscientie Minor’ — in 8-line stanzas with Latin prose sub-headings of varying lengths

BodAsh61.First Lines:
All myȝhty god in triniteffader & sone & holy
                    gosteThat is one god & persones threO stedfast god of myȝtes
                    moste…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…And grante hym lyue þat lastes ayeIn heuen where joy is
                    euer mour new
BodAsh61.Note:
At end, ‘Nunc finem feci da michi quod merui’ by
                    scribe.
BodAsh61.Editions:
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 310-29; 539-47; 619-20.

BodRawA389.First Lines:
Al myȝti god in triniteffadur & sone & holy
                    gaast…
BodRawA389.Last Lines:
…He graunte vs lyf þat laste shal ayIn heuen þere
                    euer is ioye I nowe
BodRawA389.Attributed Title:
Consciende to clere þis lessoun I rede þou lere (f.
                        99ra)

CULFf238.First Lines:
Almyghty god in trynyteffadur & soone & hooly
                    goostþat ys oo god & persones threSo þefaste lord of
                    myghtes moost…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…þe ryghtwysenesse of god were thanOonly schewyd and
                    mercy nought
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
Al myghty god in triniteffadir and sonne and holy gostThat is
                    o god and personys þreSothefast lord of myghtes
                    most…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…The rightwisnes of god wer thanOonly schewid and mercy
                    nought
CamMagPep1584.Note:
Blank in middle: bottom half of 92 and all of 92v; 72 + 23
                    stanzas.
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title:
Here…begynneth the markys of meditacioun (f. 78v); The
                    merkys of meditaciouns (Tab. Contents, f. 1); The markys of meditacions (RT);
                    Her endith the markis of meditacions that byn full profittabull to byholde (f.
                    97)

BLAdd10053.First Lines:
Almighty god in triniteFader and sone and holy
                    gost…
BLAdd10053.Last Lines:
…He graunte vs lyf that lastyth schalle ayIn heuene there euer
                    ys ioye ynow. Amen.
BLAdd10053.Note:
A note says that this was written for John Pery: ‘Orate pro
                        anima domini iohannis pery canonici ecclesie sancte trinitatis London in
                        algate’ (f. 83).

BLAdd33995.First Lines:
Almyghty godde in Trynyte ffader and sone and þe
                    halygostÞat es a godde and persones thre and a sochfast lorde of
                    myghtes mast…
BLAdd33995.Last Lines:
…Þat he hym sheld þat on gode fryday Þe Iewes
                    naylled on rode and sloweHe graunt vs lyf þat last sal ay In heuen
                    þar Ioy es ay Inowe
BLAdd33995.Note:
One column. Two verse lines per manuscript line, divided by rubricated
                    line break. Scribe writes ‘ad’ instead of ‘and’, which
                    is expanded in the transcription to ‘and’.

BLRoy17Bxvii.First Lines:
Alle mighty god in triniteFader and son & holy
                    gost…
BLRoy17Bxvii.Last Lines:
…to þat blis he wil ȝou ledeþere ioy &
                    blisse euer es
BLRoy17Bxvii.Attributed Title:
An Induction to good life by the consideration of heaven Hell and Purgatory
                    (f. 36, later hand)
BLRoy17Bxvii.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 2.36-45.
